channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 05:17 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 05:17 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 04:32 An alarm has been sounded in the Kyiv region. Stay tuned for further messages.
